means: angiogenic gene therapy 血管生成基因疗法
antibody-guided enzyme nitrile therapy 抗体引导的酶腈疗法

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词有"代表，代理人"之意。
means: delegate ： 指一般被派参加某一会议的代表。
deputy ： 指上级授权代理行事的代表，特指被选择为执行全部或部分公务的人。
representative ： 一般指被选举或委派代表某人或一些人或某个较大团体的人，其职务有时是较长期的。
agent ： 普通用词，通常指经授权代理另一个人或团体，或指在双方之间代表一方起中间作用的人。
substitute ： 主要强调某人或某物可以用来代替别的人或物的作用。

word_mean: 动因，因子：任何能产生物理、化学或生物学效应的力、成分或物质

sentence.Network_en: The agent spied for East Germany for more than twenty years.
sentence.Network_cn: 该特工人员为东德做了20多年的间谍。

sentence.Network_en: We went straight to the estate agent and wrote out a cheque.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们径直到房地产经纪人那里开了一张支票。

sentence.Network_en: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agent from £240.
sentence.Network_cn: 收费低廉的旅行社可以提供240英镑起的低价机票。

list.abs: 起云剂 (cloudy agent)是一种人造乳化均质安定剂，广泛使用在大量生产的食品作为添加物。其功用是使制品乳化、黏稠、安定，避免 …
人的种类很多,现就日常所见,列举如下: l.sales agent 销售代理人 2.purchasing agent 采购代理人 3.exclusive agent独家代理人 4.commission agent 佣金代理人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'someone or something that produces an effect'): from Latin agent- 'doing', from agere

encyclopedia.content: 一、英文单词 agent 发音：英[ˈeidʒənt] 美[ˈedʒənt] 复数：agents 释义： 名词n. 1.代理人， 代理商；经纪人；药剂；特工 2.作用者， 原动力， 动因； 作用剂 3.（化学）剂 4.发生作用锛埢虿持纸峁級的人锛埢蛭镲級；媒介物；动作者，作用者 5.锛埰鹱饔没蛴跋斓娘級动因，能因，原动力，作用力，使然力锛堉敢鹨欢ㄗ饔玫娜嘶蚱渌蛩仫級 6.手段；媒介，中介 7.【

entry.def: An agent is a person who looks after someone else's business affairs or does business on their behalf.

example.ex: You are buying direct, rather than through an agent.
example.tran: 你这是直接购买，而不是通过代理人。

example.ex: ...a written declaration by someone, authorizing another person to act as his agent.
example.tran: 一份某人授权他人为其代理人的书面申明

entry.def: An agent in the arts world is a person who gets work for an actor or musician, or who sells the work of a writer to publishers.
An agent is a person who works for a country's secret service.

example.ex: All these years he's been an agent for the East.
example.tran: 这些年来他一直是为东方国家效力的一位间谍。

entry.def: If you refer to someone or something as the agent of a particular effect, you mean that they cause this effect.

example.ex: In many societies young men regard themselves as highly active, the agents of change, shapers of the world.
example.tran: 在许多社会中，年轻人将自己看成是高度活跃的分子，是变革的推动者和世界的塑造者。

entry.def: A chemical that has a particular effect or is used for a particular purpose can be referred to as a particular kind of agent.

example.tran: 血纤维蛋白原，一种凝血剂

means.word_mean: 1. an active and efficient cause; capable of producing a certain effect;
2. a substance that exerts some force or effect
3. a representative who acts on behalf of other persons or organizations
4. a businessman who buys or sells for another in exchange for a commission
5. any agent or representative of a federal agency or bureau
6. the semantic role of the animate entity that instigates or causes the hapening denoted by the verb in the clause

list.explanation: 联邦调査局级别很低的工作人员

example.en: brick agents the Federal infantry who knock on doors, track down mysterious emigres.
example.zh: 联邦调查局级别最低的工作人员就是联邦政府的跑腿，他们走街穿巷跟踪形迹可疑的流亡者。

auth_sentence.content: Be an agent of positive change, she said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Be an agent of positive change, she said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Be an agent of positive change, she said.

auth_sentence.content: We employ a managing agent to run the block.
auth_sentence.res_content: We employ a managing agent to run the block.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We employ a managing agent to run the block.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ag做,代理做+ile……的→能做的→灵活的
ag做,代理做+ency状态;机构→代理机构
ag做,代理做+enda表示复数→做的事情→议程
ag做,代理做+ent……人→做的人→代理人;作用因素
agile[adj.灵活的,敏捷的]+ity性质,特性→n.敏捷, 活泼
agitate[v.鼓动;搅动]+ion动作或状态→n.鼓动,煽动
co共同+agent[n.作用因素;代理人]→共同做的人
counter反+agent作用因素→反作用→反抗力
re再+agent作用→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂
ag做,代理做+it+ate表动作→反复作→鼓动

Sentence.sentence: Some travel agents are thriving in spite of the economy.
The London Bank and their agents who had been negotiating with the kidnappers have not said whether any amount of money has been paid.

means.word_mean: 代理人, 代理商; 经纪人

sentences.en: A commercial agent manages the business affairs of company.
sentences.cn: 商务代理人负责代公司处理商业性事务。

means.word_mean: 作用者, 原动力, 动因; 作用剂

sentences.en: Soap is not the only cleansing agent.
sentences.cn: 肥皂并不是唯一的清洁剂。
那笔生意将由谁来代理?

jushi.english: A literary agent manages the business affairs of an author.
jushi.chinese: 文稿代理人负责代作家处理商业性事务。

jushi.english: Our agent in Rome deals with all our Italian business.
jushi.chinese: 我们在罗马的代理商负责我们在意大利的全部业务。

jushi.english: My travel agents have made all the reservations for my journey.
jushi.chinese: 旅行社人员已为我的旅程做好了一切安排。
